name: Eza
description: Installs eza, a modern replacement for ls with Git integration and colorful output, via devbox global

theme.description: Color theme for eza (db2-dark, db2-light, or none for defaults)

aliasAsLs.description: Create aliases for ls commands (ls, ll, la, lt, l) to use eza

enableIcons.description: Enable icons in output (requires Nerd Fonts in terminal)
